Player History
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/8/1986 to a 2-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Injured on 3/21/1988 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/23/1988 with a Jammed Finger, out for one week...
Injured on 7/30/1988 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit (double) on 9/16/1988, off Dan Plesac (BOS)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/13/1989, off Rich Monteleone (TEX)...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/1992, hitting .421 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
2/2/1993: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,057,143 through salary arbitration...
